scripts.build: dotnet fable Herebris.Server.fsproj --outDir fableBuild && npx rollup -c
scripts.watch-server: npx concurrently -n fable_server,rollup_server,nodemon "npm run watch-server-fable" "npm run watch-server-rollup" "npm run watch-server-nodemon"
scripts.watch-tests: npx concurrently -n fable_tests,mocha,server "npm run watch-tests-fable" "npm run watch-tests-mocha" "npm run watch-server"
